fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack another player at night.
- Lower another player's defense for the night, to a minimum of None.
- Learn a player's current defense level at the end of a night (with other abilities factored in).
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The number of abilities you can use each night is equal to the current night's number. For example, you can use 1 ability on night 1, or 4 on night 4.
- You must use each ability once before you can use them another time. This carries over between nights. (If you've used 3/4 of your abilities before Night 3 for example, on Night 3, you must use your fourth ability. Then you can choose any 2 distinct abilities of the 4 to use at the same time. Like a deck of four cards that gets reshuffled whenever it gets emptied.)
- You have Vulnerable Defense if only 1 or fewer Striked players are alive. Otherwise, you have None Defense.
